name: Sweet Potato Doughnut bites
description: These vegan doughnut bites are sure to satisfy a sweet tooth
recipeIngredient: 2/3 cup self rising flour Or all purpose flour + 2/3 teaspoon baking powder
1/4 cup mashed sweet potato (I boiled mine and mashed it)
1 Tablespoon coconut or organic canola oil
3 tbsp raw sugar or equivalent sweetener of choice (the doughnuts are mildy sweet to balance the caramel)
1/8 teaspoon of cardamom powder or chai spice blend (chai spice recipe below)

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the sugar in the sweet potato mash and add all the other ingredients except water and mix for a few seconds. Add a Tbsp of water at a time and mix/knead into a soft non too sticky dough.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix the sugar in the sweet potato mash and add all the other ingredients except water and mix for a few seconds. Add a Tbsp of water at a time and mix/knead into a soft non too sticky dough.

recipeInstructions.text: Oil hands, Divide mixture into an inch balls and place on parchment.
recipeInstructions.name: Oil hands, Divide mixture into an inch balls and place on parchment.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake in preheated 375 degrees F for 10-12 minutes, or until the tops do not look liquidy.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake in preheated 375 degrees F for 10-12 minutes, or until the tops do not look liquidy.

keywords: doughnut pieces, vegan donut, vegetable donut
